name: HMAccessoryBrowserDelegate
desc: An interface used to notify an accessory browser delegate of new accessories.

items.name: func accessoryBrowser(HMAccessoryBrowser, didFindNewAccessory: HMAccessory)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a new accessory has been discovered.

items.name: func accessoryBrowser(HMAccessoryBrowser, didRemoveNewAccessory: HMAccessory)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a new accessory is no longer available in the browser.
